text:
admetrics | Frontend Developer | Frankfurt, Germany | Full time, ONSITE, VISA

admetrics is an experienced, ambitious and cross-functional team with a flat hierarchy and an open, international culture.

We develop solutions which provide deep insight into advertising analytics. You will be part of a team that consists of talented developers, data scientists and machine learning specialists in Germany, Italy and Switzerland to solve some very challenging technical problems. You will help shape a product that is able to optimize ad efficiency based on enormous amounts of data.

Full profile: https://admetrics.io/en/career_job/:web_developer

More open positions are available here: https://admetrics.io/en/career/
